subject: Shipping
description_text:
Hello! 

Where do you ship from? 
Is there an option to be shipped from Europe in order to avoid customs? 

Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Japan7marios,    Yes, we have a warehouse in Germany and will ship from there. Please don't worry.

Thank you for your reply!
Do you have also an ETA for the new shifter?

On Thu, 13 Nov 2025 at 04:05, support@simsonn.com
Hi Japan7marios,    Expected to be listed by the end of this month.

Thank you for you answer.
Just asking because i want to buy them with the pedals.

On Mon, 17 Nov 2025 at 13:55, support@simsonn.com
